item.title: Top 7 Reasons to Visit Denver this Summer
item.description: Heading Here is example of hedings. You can use this heading by following markdownify rules. For example: use # for heading 1 and use ###### for heading 6. Emphasis Emphasis, aka italics, with asterisks or underscores. Strong emphasis, aka bold, with asterisks or underscores. Combined emphasis with asterisks and underscores. Strikethrough uses two tildes. Scratch this. Table of content Emphasis Table of content Link Paragraph Ordered List Unordered List Notice Code and Syntax Highlighting Blockquote Inline HTML Tables Image Youtube video Link I’m an inline-style link
